tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HistoricalBattles (
  battle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  battle_name VARCHAR(255),
  battle_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  participant_id INT,
  outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Battles (
	battle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	battle_name VARCHAR(255),
	battle_date DATE,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
	participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	participant_name VARCHAR(255),
	participant_role VARCHAR(50),
	battle_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (battle_id) REFERENCES Battles(battle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_battles (
  battle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  battle_name VARCHAR(255),
  battle_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  outcome VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE battle_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  battle_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  army_name VARCHAR(255),
  army_size INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (battle_id) REFERENCES historical_battles(battle_id)
)

CREATE TABLE battle_outcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  battle_id INT,
  winning_army VARCHAR(255),
  losing_army VARCHAR(255),
  victory_type VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (battle_id) REFERENCES historical_battles(battle_id)
)

CREATE TABLE battle_details (
  detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  battle_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  duration_hours INT,
  weather_conditions VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (battle_id) REFERENCES historical_battles(battle_id)
)

CREATE TABLE battles (
    battle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battle_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    battle_date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    outcome VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    army_id UUID,
    battle_id UUID
);
